title: Lone Wolf 2100
description:
Lone Wolf 2100 by Dark Horse is part homage, and partly a re-imagining of the original Lone Wolf and Cub manga comic and was produced with Kazuo Koike's, the writer and co-creator of Lone Wolf and Cub, input.

"It's a hundred years from now and the world is coming apart. A deadly manmade virus known as the War Spore is spreading across the planet. Hiding among the displaced hordes are a man named Itto and a young girl, Daisy. She is the daughter of a renowned scientist who was working on a cure for the virus. He was her father's bodyguard, but now his accused murderer. They're on the run from the operatives of the Cygnat Owari Corporation who will stop at nothing to kill Itto and retrieve Daisy."

Written by Mike Kennedy with Art by Francisco Ruiz Velasco.


Released on http://ComicPirates.info
